titles.title: United States Parole Commission Extension Act of 2008
To provide for the continued performance of the functions of the United States Parole Commission.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1478)
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
7/16/2008--Introduced.
United States Parole Commission Extension Act of 2008 - Extends the U.S. Parole Commission for three years (until October 31, 2011).
